name: OVERLORD SACRIFICE
description:
Developed through thunder storms and load shedding. A pair of 15 year olds work through the night to have this game ready for Ludum Dare 43. AND NOW ITS HERE!!!

In this game you crashed on an alien planet and come across an Overlord who wants to sacrifice his rivalry Overlords' hearts. He then sends you to retrieve it in exchange for repairing your ship.
